title: Letter
description:
The status of a letter in the supplier-api domain.

This will include the current production status, any reason provided for the status, if applicable, and identifiers used for grouping in reports.

origin.title: Letter origin
origin.description:
Identifiers captured from the original event that introduced the letter to the supplier-api domain.

The identifier will be included as the origin domain in the subject of any corresponding events emitted by the supplier-api domain.

domain.title: Domain ID
domain.description: The domain which requested this letter

source.title: Event source
source.description: The source of the event which created this letter

subject.title: Event subject
subject.description: The subject of the event which created this letter, scoped to source

event.title: Event ID
event.description: The ID of the event which created this letter

specificationId.title: Specification ID
specificationId.description: Reference to the letter specification which was used to produce a letter pack for this request.

groupId.title: Group ID
groupId.description: Identifier for the group which this letter assigned to for reporting purposes.

status.title: Letter Status
status.description: The status of a letter in the supplier-api domain.

reasonCode.title: Reason Code
reasonCode.description: Optional reason code for the status change, if applicable.

reasonText.title: Reason Text
reasonText.description: Optional human-readable reason for the status change, if applicable.
